subject: junit - java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError
msgSnippet: i get this error when i run my unit test.  does anyone know what the cause is? i think it s a classpath problem.  the frustrating thing is that i ve seen this
messageBody:
i get this error when i run my unit test. does anyone know what the
cause is? i think it's a classpath problem. the frustrating thing is
that i've seen this problem before.

thanks,
mike
